sn22.81:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
sn22.81:1.2: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kosambiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn22.81:1.3: Kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sāmaṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṃghaṃ eko adutiyo cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
sn22.81:2.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu acirapakkantassa bhagavato yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.81:2.2: “esāvuso ānanda, bhagavā sāmaṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ eko adutiyo cārikaṃ pakkanto”ti.
sn22.81:2.3: “Yasmiṃ, āvuso, samaye bhagavā sāmaṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ eko adutiyo cārikaṃ pakkamati, ekova bhagavā tasmiṃ samaye viharitukāmo hoti;
sn22.81:2.4: na bhagavā tasmiṃ samaye kenaci anubandhitabbo hotī”ti.
sn22.81:3.1: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena pālileyyakaṃ tadavasari.
sn22.81:3.2: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā pālileyyake viharati bhaddasālamūle.
sn22.81:3.3: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu.
sn22.81:3.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.81:3.5: “cirassutā kho no, āvuso ānanda, bhagavato sammukhā dhammī kathā;
sn22.81:3.6: icchāma mayaṃ, āvuso ānanda, bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ sotun”ti.
sn22.81:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando tehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ yena pālileyyakaṃ bhaddasālamūlaṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn22.81:4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
sn22.81:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.81:4.4: “kathaṃ nu kho jānato kathaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti?
sn22.81:4.5: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.81:4.14: Evaṃ vicayaso desito, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo.
sn22.81:4.15: Evaṃ vicayaso desite kho, bhikkhave, mayā dhamme atha ca panidhekaccassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.81:4.16: ‘kathaṃ nu kho jānato kathaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotī’ti?
sn22.81:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, jānato kathaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti?
sn22.81:5.2: Idha bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.81:5.4: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:5.5: So pana saṅkhāro kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo?
sn22.81:5.6: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:5.8: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:5.10: Sāpi vedanā, sopi phasso anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:5.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:6.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati;
sn22.81:6.2: api ca kho rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati.
sn22.81:6.3: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:6.4: So pana saṅkhāro kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo?
sn22.81:6.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:6.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:6.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:7.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati;
sn22.81:7.2: api ca kho attani rūpaṃ samanupassati.

sn22.81:8.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati, na attani rūpaṃ samanupassati;
sn22.81:8.2: api ca kho rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassati.
sn22.81:8.3: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:8.4: So pana saṅkhāro kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo?
sn22.81:8.5: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:8.7: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:8.12: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato …pe… āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:9.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ, na attani rūpaṃ, na rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.2: api ca kho vedanaṃ attato samanupassati, api ca kho vedanāvantaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati, api ca kho attani vedanaṃ samanupassati, api ca kho vedanāya attānaṃ samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.4: api ca kho saṅkhāre attato samanupassati, api ca kho saṅkhāravantaṃ attānaṃ samanupassati, api ca kho attani saṅkhāre samanupassati, api ca kho saṅkhāresu attānaṃ samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.5: api ca kho viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, api ca kho viññāṇavantaṃ attānaṃ, api ca kho attani viññāṇaṃ, api ca kho viññāṇasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassati.
sn22.81:9.6: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:9.8: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:9.10: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:9.15: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:10.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:10.7: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn22.81:10.8: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, sassatadiṭṭhi saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:10.10: evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:11.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:11.7: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn22.81:11.9: ‘no cassaṃ no ca me siyā nābhavissaṃ na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.81:11.10: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, ucchedadiṭṭhi saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:11.11: So pana saṅkhāro kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo?

sn22.81:11.14: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco …pe…
sn22.81:11.15: evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:12.1: Na heva kho rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na vedanaṃ …
sn22.81:12.5: na viññāṇasmiṃ attato samanupassati, nāpi evaṃdiṭṭhi hoti:
sn22.81:12.6: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti;
sn22.81:12.8: ‘no cassaṃ no ca me siyā nābhavissaṃ na me bhavissatī’ti;
sn22.81:12.9: api ca kho kaṅkhī hoti vicikicchī aniṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme.
sn22.81:12.10: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, kaṅkhitā vicikicchitā aniṭṭhaṅgatatā saddhamme saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:12.11: So pana saṅkhāro kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo?
sn22.81:12.12: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:12.14: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:12.19: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.
